changes.change: Added support for enabling and disabling the Control Center grabber
Added ability to shift the datetime view
Added support for enabling and disabling the homebar
Added support for customising the swipe up to unlock label
Added support to enable and disable the whole tweak
Added option to disable and enable the iPhone X lock icon
Added the ability to disable and enable quick actions
Added support for custom date and time formats
Added support for system 12 and 24 hour times
Added support for toggling the time and date labels on or off
Added right orientating for time and date labels
